All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Account
    Represents an player account.
    AccountActivity
    Activity where the logged in player can manage their account Displays number of codes scanned, total score, highest and lowest score Leads to account's codes, stats, unique login code and status code
    AccountFragment
    Unused for part 3 deliverables Will be used in the future for nav bar functionality
    Callback
    Generic callback function
    Comment
    Represents a comment made by an Account
    CommentList
    Custom list object that holds a list of comments
    CommentsActivity
    Activity where anyone can view or add comments attached to a particular QR code.
    CurrentAccount
    Lazy Singleton Holds the Account that is currently logged into the device
    EditInfoActivity
    Activity where logged in user can edit their account information
    LeaderboardActivity
    Activity that displays a global leaderboard.
    LeaderboardFragment
    Fragment for the global leaderboard To be developed further on
    LocationFragment
    Fragment for the geolocation To be developed further on
    LoginActivity
    LoginActivity Handles Account Registration TODO: Rename Activity
    LoginQRActivity
    Activity where logged in user can access their Login QR code
    MainActivity
    Startup Activity Checks for existing account and proceeds to app Otherwise, if no account exists, sends to LoginActivity
    MainFragment
    Fragment for MainActivity To be developed later
    MapActivity
    Displays the map of nearby QR codes To be developed later
    MyCodesActivity
    Activity where logged in user can access and manage the codes they have scanned NOTE: This is functionally different from ViewCodesActivity.
    MyCodesFragment
    Fragment of list of codes scanned by player To be developed further
    MyStatsActivity
    Activity where logged in user can view their stats
    PhotoActivity
    Activity where player can take a photo related to the QR they just scanned.
    PlayerPreview
    Holds data relevant for a player preview Helps custom views display player data TODO: easily extensible if needed!
    PlayerScoreAdapter
    Custom ArrayAdapter for displaying listviews with multiple components.
    PostScanActivity
    Activity that comes immediately after scanning a QR code.
    ProfileActivity
    Activity displaying the profile of any player.
    QR
    This class represents a QR code.
    QRListAdapter
    Grid View adapter for the grid view in "MyCodesActivity" Class
    QRListViewHolder
    Holder class for a QR ListView
    QRPageActivity
    Activity that shows details about a particular QR code.
    QueryCallback
    WILL SOON BE REPLACED WITH THE REGULAR CALLBACK IN PART 4
    QueryHandler
    Class for holding all Querys to the Firestore database.
    Record
    Represents a record of a QR that was scanned by a player
    ScannedByActivity
    Activity that displays a list of all the players that have scanned a particular QR code.
    SearchPlayersActivity
    Activity that lets anyone search for other players by their username
    SearchPlayersFragment
    Fragment for player search To be implemented further
    StatusQRActivity
    Activity where logged in user can access their Status QR Code
    ViewCodesActivity
    Activity that displays all the codes scanned by a player.
